OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope of the connector, e.g. 'IPv4-Addr,IPv6-Addr,Indicator'.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_AUTO.description: Whether the connector should run automatically when an entity is created or updated.

SHADOWTRACKR_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of the ShadowTrackr API.

SHADOWTRACKR_MAX_TLP.description: Max TLP level of the entities to enrich.

SHADOWTRACKR_REPLACE_WITH_LOWER_SCORE.description: Replace the score with a lower score based on the ShadowTrackr false positive estimate.

SHADOWTRACKR_REPLACE_VALID_TO_DATE.description: Set the valid to date to tomorrow for CDNs, Clouds and VPNs.
